author: HTTP vs. HTTPs : Why SSL and TLS are important
content: [...] So it was really surprising to see a company like Maxis, incorrectly setup the certificate for their Maxis forum. Forum.Maxis.com.my, is supposed to be a forum for Maxis customers to congregate and discuss issues and ideas on their service, it’s the Â main source of information for my post on configuring maxis for your VPN.
